title: CodeJam 2023 - 1st Place
short_description: Secured the top position in the annual university-level coding competition.
full_description: Competed against over 100 participants in a 5-hour long competitive programming contest, solving complex algorithmic problems with speed and accuracy.
how_achieved: The competition involved multiple rounds, starting with an online qualifier and culminating in an on-site final. Success was based on solving the maximum number of problems in the shortest time, with penalties for incorrect submissions.
words_about_it: This was a challenging yet incredibly rewarding experience. It pushed my problem-solving skills to their limits and was a great testament to the power of practice and perseverance.

title: Top Open Source Contributor
short_description: Recognized for significant contributions to a major open-source project.
full_description: Contributed over 50 pull requests to the 'AuroraUI' framework, focusing on improving accessibility features and component performance. Recognized as one of the top 10 contributors for the year.
how_achieved: Contributions were made over a period of six months, involving bug fixes, feature implementations, and active participation in community discussions. The recognition was based on the quality and quantity of merged pull requests.
words_about_it: Working with the open-source community was a fantastic learning opportunity. Collaborating with developers from around the world broadened my perspective and deepened my technical expertise.
